name: BlessMyDay
0:
”Alexa, open Bless My Day”
”Alexa, start Bless My Day”
”Alexa, launch Bless My Day”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bless my day
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Bless My Day is a skill to help you start your day feeling inspired. 

This skill is not tied to any particular religion. It's perfect for anyone who wants a unique blessing that's different every time. Alexa will ask your name and then bless your day with something just for you. 

Simple to use, uplifting and positive. 

You can say:

"Alexa, open Bless My Day"
"Alexa, start Bless My Day"
"Alexa, launch Bless My Day"

Please leave a review if you love this skill, or send us an email with your suggestions at alice@alicelangholt.com. Your reviews encourage us to keep making more great skills, and thank you! This is my 16th skill and I hope you like it! Love, Alice

By the way...to add this skill to a daily timer, follow these steps:

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" > Select Bless my Day 
6. Choose Device to perform the routine > SAVE.
